direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate ISIN codes but return different types of results (boolean vs. Object).
The isValid method depends on checkCode for country code validation.
The isValid method in CodeValidator can be substituted for the isValid method in ISINValidator for basic validation.
The validate method in CodeValidator can be substituted for the validate method in ISINValidator for detailed validation.
Both methods access the CheckDigit resource for validation purposes.
Both methods access the RegexValidator resource for pattern matching.
